channel.title: Why hasnt Mopar done this?
channel.description: Why has moparscape users not created like Teams to develop RSPS's for the website and release like monthly. I think that'd be cool, and the best RSPS released they would get a tag for a month. It would have people a reason to release shit and its fun ^^. Also you could flaunt your work.

item.title: Why hasnt Mopar done this?
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

sinisoul:

Because most of the developers here are trash

Read full topic

item.title: Why hasnt Mopar done this?
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

You’re not thinking the same type of ‘perfect’. My ‘perfect’ is clean, efficient, modular and not a definition of how I want the server to emulate the game. I could care less how close to Runescape it is, I’d be more concerned with how the server and client interact in a perfect manner. And yes there is a ‘perfect’ way to do it and Graham made a huge step in the right direction by introducing the service model in Apollo.

Read full topic

item.title: Why hasnt Mopar done this?
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

It’s so dangerous to say ‘perfect design’… we barely know how Jagex’s Runescape source looks like…
You could make 80%-90% of the structure match to that of Jagex but fuck… The fine details are things NOBODY on this forum would be bothered to deal with.
I do like how lately these kinds of things are being discusses more and more, so I hope that eventually this will motivate a couple people to do somthing.
Not me though… fuck networking :fp:

Read full topic

Go Jorsa. Win that $9k.

item.title: Why hasnt Mopar done this?
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

Just get a real job that pays 20k+ a year (minimum wage is around 15k a year) and tell mitb to shuv his 9k up his bum. It would take around 3 months (working 8 hours a day) to this for mitb not forgetting at the acceptable standard. For those half twit coders that may want to attempt this, how would you feel if your work was just not good enough. If you work in a team the money would get split also.

If your work was somewhat decent and he was paying you to make sources, for every four sources at 9k each would be 36k a year. idk what mitb is doing, most of the people on this forum are either in full time education, already have jobs so nobody can dedicate and can put effort towards it. For those who don’t care how long it takes even if its spending 10 mins a day or 5 mins a week, do you really think it would be work it especially since it would take much longer whereas it would be more enjoyable just working at mac donnalds lol?

Read full topic

item.title: Why hasnt Mopar done this?
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

Zeanr:

Sinisoul is calling everyone garbage, yet he’s a java guru… why don’t you make one and get paid the money?

Because developing a well designed server takes time and I have yet to come up with a ‘perfect’ design.

Read full topic

/thread

Jmood:

The notion that someone is the best at programming is just stupid beyond reason

item.title: Why hasnt Mopar done this?
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

[quote=“4x4Chevrolet, post:48, topic:523801”]When someone comes out with a good source nobody even bothers to do anything with it.[/quote]that’s because people want content and features that will make them money. they can’t take a stable base and make profit off of it.

and the people with the knowledge to write efficiently don’t have the time, will, or patience to write content and features.

Read full topic

item.title: Why hasnt Mopar done this?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

The notion that someone is the best at programming is just stupid beyond reason, Runesource was a proof of concept the same as WinterLove, it was made to show that a single threaded server designed the same way as WinterLove could perform just as well if not better then most servers released at that time. The reason as to why no one except Blake and Boomer have released a server to MITB is because they’re to busy making $9,500 a week with donations on their server and they have no reason to sell it to MITB. You must also realize most of the people capable of creating a well designed server that fit the criteria are either not apart of this community or aren’t even interested in programming a server for this game.

Read full topic

item.title: Why hasnt Mopar done this?
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:45, topic:523801”][quote author=Arcik link=topic=642347.msg4331126#msg4331126 date=1373661668]

the money is still available, of course.
the only submissions that were ever made were two by mitb himself, and one by blakeman8192 and b00mer (which who knows what the hell happened to)
[/quote]if blakeman couldn’t make bank from mitb then I doubt anybody here could lol

blakeman is not that good of a coder he couldn’t make a bank from anyone, I was never a fan of runesource lol.

What is your definition of a ‘good coder’ then, because he’s one of the best in the RSPS scene, if not #1.[/quote]i wouldnt say #1. but he is smart.

Read full topic

item.title: Why hasnt Mopar done this?
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

[quote=“Ambokile, post:40, topic:523801”]The money may be available buy there’s debate about whether the actual offer is still available. It probably doesn’t help that the “example of the correct structure” is a dead link.[/quote]if mitb were to ever touch that bank account, he’d be making profit off of this site, and then be back into the shit with jagex.

MITB:

I would ask that you point me to the exact United States law that prohibits me from even mentioning the word runescape, I use it in no way for a monetary gain, which I believe is the only way one could use it in an illegal manner. I don’t use the word runescape in any way differing from that of other communities you support such as tip.it and runehq.com.

https://www.moparisthebest.com/lawstuff

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:41, topic:523801”][quote author=Vain_ link=topic=642347.msg4331095#msg4331095 date=1373659889]
the money is still available, of course.
the only submissions that were ever made were two by mitb himself, and one by blakeman8192 and b00mer (which who knows what the hell happened to)
[/quote]if blakeman couldn’t make bank from mitb then I doubt anybody here could lol[/quote]the server was apparently finished, and the payment process was started. then b00mer and blake just backed out of it or something?

Read full topic
